fields.name: Patrol:
fields.value: Target a number of players, based on your score (0-32% = 1, 33-65% = 2, 66%+ = 3). You will astrally roleblock any visitor who shares neither alignment nor subalignment with your target. For example, Neutral Killing visiting Town Investigative gets roleblocked, but Mafia Killing visiting Town Killing does not.

fields.name: Vigilance (Passive):
fields.value: Triggered when your standard deviation is below 27.50%. Patrol detects astral visits as well.

fields.name: TASER (3x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top 3. Use in conjunction with Patrol. You have a [your score]% chance of attacking (in addition to roleblocking) each qualifying visitor of your Patrol targets.
